banner.title: Free Online Tutoring for K-12 Students!!

features.title: Fully Student Run
features.description:
All tutors are experienced highschool students with backgrounds in a variety of subjects.
              Every tutor has the experience and education necessary to guide students through difficult subjects.

features.title: Virtual Sessions
features.description:
Students meet with tutors one-on-one through video calls with the Zoom platform.
              Communication is crucial, and Tutorberry will maintain close contact and always be open for questions or comments.

features.title: Wide Variety of Subjects
features.description:
Our tutors are experienced in and prepared to teach a variety of subjects, such as Math, Language Arts, Foreign Studies, and Social Studies.
              Each tutor will work closely with the student.

Content.title: Our mission is to make your life easier.
Content.subtitle: Tutorberry is a student-led online volunteer program that provides free tutoring for students in grades 1 - 8. We understand that this is a confusing and stressful time for many, and we believe that students deserve easy and affordable access to the help needed for education.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: Meet our awesome group of students

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.subtitle: How our volunteer based organization can provide free tutoring to students.
